Text: Oñ i ño̩ lewa che o̩jo̩ kʼamo̩ma e-O̩jo̩ lewa kʼo̩la-ma jo̩ o̩gba Jihofa, E̩nebi le̩ laño̩ lewa ef uma kʼi dʼo̩la-wñ wa o̩gba O̩jo̩ ge̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñw E̩nebi le̩ kakini, Ugbo e̩ kwo wa? E̩ne̩bi le̩ la dohi ñwu Jihofa kakini, U kwo ale tʼemi tʼano̩mo̩ ile̩, kpai alelo lewa efu-wñ.

Taku Jihofa ka ñw E̩nebi le̩ kakini, Uwe̩ fʼibe adu-mi Job lo me̩? todu i nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi dab owñ ile̩ n, i nʼuchalu n, e̩no̩kpakpa i che; e̩ne̩ ki arailo O̩jo̩ kʼi la mubidagba e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ i che. I la agwo̩nyʼochochi-wñ ta, dagba e̩ chaka kʼumi e̩che̩ kʼu kobʼo̩, kʼu mʼu du mi tebitele ofo.
Tak E̩ne̩bi le̩ dohi ñwu Jihofa kakini, Año̩ koji año̩: e̩wñ du kʼone̩ ne̩ i adu jadu oji-wñ.
E̩ muda nʼo̩wo̩-we̩ dala kadʼachiku-wñ kpʼo̩re̩la-wñ, tak i abʼuwe̩ na eju-we̩.
Taku Jihofa ka ñw E̩nebi le̩ kakini, Go, owñ dʼef o̩wo̩-we̩; chai iñmi-wñ e̩ bu te̩.
Abe̩le̩ E̩ne̩bi le̩ kwʼo̩gba Jihofa le dufu, oñ i nʼikete̩ o̩ko̩ ki bie̩ne̩ kpa Job, akwʼadaba e̩re̩-wñ gbogbo tʼakpe̩te̩ oji-wñ.
Tak i mʼanade du ña o̩la-wñ; oñ i kwogugu ef elulu.
Tak o̩ya-wñ ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ agwo̩nyʼochochi-we̩ ta? BʼO̩jo̩ ina kʼe̩ ku.
Ama i ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ ko̩la alu kʼonobule̩ e̩fule̩fu aka. E̩wñ? A gbʼe̩nyo̩ o̩wo̩ O̩jo̩, a ñʼagba e̩bie̩ne̩ ge̩ n? Ef e̩wñ-i du Job nʼuko-wñ dure n.

Oñ e̩gba kʼamonuku Job me̩ta gbʼinabali e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ du ki wa bu Job ma, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ kwʼugbo kʼi de̩ wa: E̩laifaz e̩ne̩ Teman, kpai Bildad e̩ne̩ Shua, kpai Zofar e̩ne̩ Naamat. Oñ ma fʼalu jo̩ ku ma wa bʼo̩ raku ku ma nyʼi e̩do̩.
Tak e̩gba ku ma chʼeju nyʼate̩ o̩najiji ma mejumʼowñ n; ma dʼomu dago araku, oñ e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩-ma fʼotogbo-wñ fana, ma la fʼebutu gba bʼo̩la-ma oji ma rʼo̩wo̩ efojale.
Abe̩le̩ ma kwogugu ane̩pe̩te̩ kpʼowñ o̩ro̩ka mebie kpʼodu mebie, e̩ne̩ du la kʼo̩la okate ñw u n: todu ma li ka kʼiwo̩-wñ tabale.
